title: Suspect in deadly attack on Muslim family had no known ties to hate groups
content:
1. Suspect in deadly attack on Muslim family had no known ties to hate groups  New York Post
  2. Canada anti-Muslim attack: 'It could have been any one of us'  Al Jazeera English
  3. Egypt denounces 'terrorist' truck attack that killed Canadian Muslim family in Ontario  Egypttoday
  4. Vigils planned in Windsor and Chatham-Kent for Muslim family killed in vehicle attack  CTV News Windsor
  5. Nationwide tributes pour in for Muslim family killed in London, Ont. vehicle attack  Global News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
